comments:
3.1-RC3 test pass

- from the pkg explorer, select File>New>Class
- enter 'A' into the name field
- give focus to the package field, enter com.example
- press <return> to finish class creation (do not use the mouse or <tab> to give
focus to the 'Finish' button, but simply press <return> which will activate the
default button)

-> the dialog stays open, only 'Cancel' is enabled
-> exception below in the log

Notes
- the close button of the dialog decorations will close the dialog and one can
continue working -> no lost data)
- pressing the 'Finish' button using the mouse, or by tabbing through the
controls and selecting it works as expected (-> simple workaround available).
